name: Music_2947.wav
caption: This is a Valentine's ballad. The male vocalist is singing gently in the Thai language. There is an acoustic guitar, a piano and a flute playing the melody interchangeably. There is a simple acoustic drum beat in the rhythmic background. The atmosphere of this piece is romantic. It could be used in romantic social media content in Thailand. It could also be used in romantic movies and TV shows that take place in Thailand.
